m :  i think the hostess really went out of her way to make the party a success .
w :  yes  the food and drinks were great  but if only we had known a few of the other guests .

question: what did the two speakers say about the party ?
choice: they went a long way to attend the party .
they didn ' t think much of the food and drinks .
they knew none of the other guests at the party .
answer: they knew none of the other guests at the party .
